story_teamflare_02_14000/2401_1001_0400_:
I never thought the boss of Team Flare would have
a Pokémon like that...
story_teamflare_02_14000/2401_1001_0500_:
I can’t believe it has power to destroy a
whole town.
story_teamflare_02_14000/2401_1001_0600_: That’s not all we found out!
story_teamflare_02_14000/2401_1001_0700_: Yup! Lysandre said Pasio is beautiful.
story_teamflare_02_14000/2401_1001_0800_:
My heart hurts thinking that I need to eliminate
such a beautiful place like Pasio.
story_teamflare_02_14000/2401_1001_0900_:
If he can find hope in this world, I’m sure there’s
a way to avoid fighting!
story_teamflare_02_14000/2401_1001_1000_: I agree! I hope so, too!
story_teamflare_02_14000/2401_1001_1100_:
By the way, I’ve been wondering... Is she also
from the International Police?
story_teamflare_02_14000/2401_1001_1200_: I’m sorry for being late to introduce myself.
story_teamflare_02_14000/2401_1001_1300_:
My name is Anabel. I’m a member of a secret
division of the International Police.
story_teamflare_02_14000/2401_1001_1400_: She is my boss and came to help us.
story_teamflare_02_14000/2401_1001_1500_:
Thanks to her, we were able to stop Team
Rocket’s evil plot.
story_teamflare_02_14000/2401_1001_1600_: But...if we think about it, it’s strange.
story_teamflare_02_14000/2401_1001_1800_:
Team Rocket’s usual motive is to use Pokémon in
their evil schemes to make money.
story_teamflare_02_14000/2401_1001_1900_:
But they tried to steal Team Flare’s
destructive weapon.
story_teamflare_02_14000/2401_1001_2000_:
It would make more sense if they were trying to
take Yveltal or Volcanion instead.
story_teamflare_02_14000/2401_1001_2200_: I wonder what Team Rocket’s motive is.
story_teamflare_02_14000/2401_1001_2300_: There is one possibility that I can think of.
story_teamflare_02_14000/2401_1001_2500_:
Yes, I recently got some information from the
Aether Foundation that some of their research
materials were stolen.
